sys_hub_flow.description: Scheduled flow to check for overdue NeedIt Tasks, close the overdue tasks, update the work notes for the task with a reason, and log the automatic closure.
sys_hub_flow.name: Close Overdue tasks

sys_element_mapping.value: Task {{7c91ab29-4da3-49ad-8fba-e8f2315def7a.item.number}} was automatically closed because its Due date of {{7c91ab29-4da3-49ad-8fba-e8f2315def7a.item.due_date}} was older than the autoCloseOverdue setting of {{be291a0d-86f4-41f0-8dd9-8c57f9e39d51.property_value}} days.
